description: Advances from a bustling town to a veritable metropolis, full of the wonders of modern technology. This is the Kush city phase, where workers gatehr grain 10% faster. While archers gain 3 range but take 10% more train time.
tooltip: Advance to Town Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies. Civic Centers +25% territory influence radius, 40% more garrison capacity and +5 range but -3% pierce dmg. Structures +3 capture points regeneration rate per garrisoned unit. Workers 10% faster farming. Archers fire 5% faster are 10% more accurate and gain 2 range
